name: Frauki's Adventure - Alpha
description:
preecedev.tumblr.com

Built in gamepad support!! Just plug it in and push a button, you should then see a little SNES icon in the bottom right corner. Have fun hopping, bopping, slashing, and smashing.

Key board controls (these will be improved):

  • Z: Slash (try it while doing different things to see different attacks)
  • X: Roll (to avoid danger)
  • C: Special Weapon (if you have one)
  • V: Eat Apple (tasty)
  • Space: Jump (And you can flip in the air)
  • Up: Enter a door, and investigate some sparklies
  • Arrows: Move, crouch, and look up
